name: 基礎設計（一）
description: 本課程為基礎設計課程，由工作坊形式(workshop)為引導學生藉由草圖、比例模型、基本造型進行設計思考發想(design thinking)、小組討論(group discussion)、動手製作(making)的實體物件與作品發表(presentation)，培養學生了解基本創作思考與設計流程的認識；了解造形形式原理與構成組織方法，以培養造形創作表現的基礎能力。
goals: Cultivate the basic concepts and literacy students need to have in design profession.
Improve students' judgment and aesthetic value in visual observation.
Enable students to have a wide range of relevant knowledge and comprehensive abilities of creating more ideal life by design.
Understand how design can potentially improve human life by incorporating the new technologies for the future.
syllabus:
We live, in fact, in the three-dimensional world. What we see in front of us is not a flat picture with length and breadth only, but an expanse with physical depth, the third dimension. The outline of course is summarised as follows: 

*   Exploring the two/ three-dimensional space.
*   Research on the problems of creating in the three-dimensional space.
*   Overviewing design principles and practices common to most design professions
*   Leaning professional designers’ thinking to create the artwork/product.
*   Discussing the created/ designed artwork/ product made by students

**Schedule**  
Course introduction  
Basic design principles  
Design principles discussion  
Design principles assignment critique  
Design principles critique  
Project report and reference sharing  
Final presentations
